code: const generateSummary=argumentSchema=>{const{R,A,S,G,V,E,D,P}=argumentSchema;if(R&&A&&S&&G&&V){return"In the current circumstances ".concat(R,", we should perform action ").concat(A,", which will result in new circumstances ").concat(S,", realizing goal ").concat(G,", promoting value ").concat(V);}else if(E&&D&&A){return"Source ".concat(E," is an expert in subject domain ").concat(D," containing proposition ").concat(A,", ").concat(E," asserts that ").concat(A," is true, therefore ").concat(A," is true");}else if(P&&A){return"".concat(P," is in a position to know whether ").concat(A," is true or not, ").concat(P," asserts that ").concat(A," is true, therefore ").concat(A," is true");}else{return'No summary available';}};export default generateSummary;
